main event: A glowing object was observed descending vertically near Vaughn, New Mexico on multiple occasions in November 1948.
interesting points: The object appeared bright white and about the size of a basketball during its descent., Witnesses reported that the object exploded without noise as it neared the ground., The report suggests the observed phenomena might be man-made devices related to scientific experiments., The sightings occurred around 10 miles east of Vaughn at approximately 2200 hours., The weather conditions during the sightings were noted as clear.
sighted object: a ball of light, reddish white in color, 1 foot in diameter
witness description: Colonel who was driving along Highway 60
